name: Slow Cooker Lemon Garlic Chicken II
author: Carla Joy
summary: Seasoned, browned chicken breasts slow cooked with lemon juice, garlic, and chicken bouillon. A wonderful 'fix and forget' recipe that is easy and pleases just about everyone. Great served with rice or pasta, or even alone.
ingredients: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
directions: In a bowl, mix the oregano, salt, and pepper
Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat
Brown chicken  in butter for 3 to 5 minutes on each side
Place chicken in a slow cooker
In the same skillet, mix the water, lemon juice, garlic, and bouillon
Pour over the chicken in the slow cooker
Cover, and cook on High for 3 hours, or Low for 6 hours
Add the parsley to the slow cooker 15 to 30 minutes before the end of the cook time
